description: In this course you will learn how to use the law of attraction to be a more positive parent. During my training to be a Law of Attraction Practitioner I began looking at ways that I could use my skills as a parent. I share my favourite and most effective tips to use the law of attraction as a parent. Some sessions focus on you as a parent and others are to help your child use the law of attraction.
title: Positive Parenting Using The Law Of Attraction
